intro: Neochilenia neofusca, commonly known as the dark neochilenia, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the Asteraceae family. It is native to South America, particularly found in regions of Chile and Argentina. The plant is characterized by its narrow, linear leaves and produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in composite heads. It thrives in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and rocky slopes. Neochilenia neofusca is often used in traditional medicine for its purported therapeutic properties.
